column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I appreciate your candid feedback and have taken your notes to heart; we have made significant changes to our staff; furthermore
column2: I have contracted a "Secret Shopper" agency to test our servers on a weekly basis. All that aside
column4: we count on folks like yourself to provide us the best sense of how we're doing. I am glad we have met your approval. Thank you for your continued patronage and hope to see you again soon.
